revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Granite Cave |image = [[File:Granite Cave.png|300px]] |caption = An outside view of Granite Cave. |tokens = 16,000 |location = South of Route 106. }} '''Granite Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 410,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || colspan=2 rowspan=6|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Abra.png|40px]] Abra |- | [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude |- | [[File:Makuhita.png|40px]] Makuhita |- | [[File:Aron.png|40px]] Aron |- | [[File:Sableye.png|40px]] Sableye |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== <!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Mawile.png|40px]] Mawile || <center>960,000 || colspan=3 rowspan=2|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Nosepass.png|40px]] Nosepass || <center>660,000 |}
==Items== <!--T:6-->
<tabs> <!--T:7--> <tab name="No Debuff">
<!--T:8--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Pokéball}} || N/A || 24.99% || 24.00% || 20.00% |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || N/A || 24.99% || 24.00% || 20.00% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || N/A || 24.99% || 24.00% || 20.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 10.00% || 10.50% || 12.47% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 10.00% || 10.50% || 12.47% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Iron Plate}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.50% |- | {{Bag2|Earth Plate}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.50% |- | {{Bag2|Everstone}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.50% |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.50% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Medium Restore}} || N/A || 0.33% || 0.53% || 1.33% |- | {{Bag2|Star Piece}} || N/A || 0.33% || 0.53% || 1.33% |- | {{Bag2|Hard Stone}} || N/A || 0.33% || 0.53% || 1.33% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Heart Scale}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.22% || 1.06% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:9-->
<!--T:10--> After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:11--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Pokéball}} || N/A || 25.00% || 25.00% || 25.00% |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || N/A || 25.00% || 25.00% || 25.00% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || N/A || 25.00% || 25.00% || 25.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Iron Plate}} || N/A || 0.22% || 0.22% || 0.22% |- | {{Bag2|Earth Plate}} || N/A || 0.22% || 0.22% || 0.22% |- | {{Bag2|Everstone}} || N/A || 0.22% || 0.22% || 0.22% |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.22% || 0.22% || 0.22% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Medium Restore}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Star Piece}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Hard Stone}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Heart Scale}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |} </tab> </tabs>
